63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Through another group of narrators, Anas bin Malik said: "When the Prophet (ﷺ) arrived at Medina, the eldest amongst his companions was Abu Bakr. He dyed his hair with Hinna and Katam till it became of dark red color

chapter.ara-name: باب هِجْرَةُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَصْحَابِهِ إِلَى الْمَدِينَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The emigration of the Prophet (ﷺ) to Al-Madina
